item.title: Lifelong learner
item.description: Many of us describe ourselves applying labels that shape our identity. Someone says, “I’m a musician”, and this behavior gives him a sense of belonging, feeling connected to a group. Others prefer to describe themselves by their characteristics, hobbies or lifestyle such as vegetarians, extroverts, gamer, easygoing. Each label indicates a set of habits. Zygmunt Bauman, a sociologist who described the world from a fascinating perspective, says that we live in the liquid modernity in which everything changes quickly and nothing is done to last.
